sentences.cn: 一条缀有珠子的连衣裙

sentences.en: Beaded dewdrops stood upon the leaves and grasses.
sentences.cn: 露珠儿还逗留在树叶和草叶上.

sentences.en: Gifts Articles Beaded Neck, Wrist Ornamentation , Antique , Tribal, Stone Components.
sentences.cn: 采购产品礼品, 项链,手链, 古董, 石头装饰.

sentences.en: He lowered it and drew his hunting - knife from its beaded sheath at his hip.
sentences.cn: 他放下枪,从屁股后面的镶珠刀鞘里拔出猎刀.

sentences.en: His face was beaded with small particles of rain.
sentences.cn: 他的脸上挂满了小雨点儿.

sentences.en: His face was beaded with sweat.
His face was beaded with tears.
Moisture beaded on the bottles as I walked back to the trees.
sentences.cn: 等我回头走到树下,瓶子外面结满水珠.

sentences.en: Sweat beaded up on his forehead.
sentences.cn: 他额头上渗出点点汗珠.

sentences.en: Tears were beaded on her cheeks.
sentences.cn: 她双颊挂着成串的泪珠.

sentences.en: The cave walls were beaded with moisture.
sentences.cn: 这个洞穴壁上布满了水珠。

sentences.en: The enemy's beaded forehead puckered doubtfully.
sentences.cn: 对手迟疑地皱起冒着汗珠的前额.

sentences.en: The man's bald head was beaded with sweat.
sentences.cn: 这个男人的光头上满是汗珠。

sentences.en: There are usually 3 or 4 conical cups having rolled or beaded edges.
sentences.cn: 一般有三或四个滚边的或卷边的锥形杯.

sentences.en: Thirdly, catalogues are a hassle free means of purchasing beads beaded items.
sentences.cn: 第三, 按商品目录购买珠子和珠宝首饰会省去麻烦.

形成珠状；[机] 卷边；起泡，起泡剂

trans.tran_en: A beaded dress, cushion, or other object is decorated with beads
